document.heading: Nonprofit Housing Organizations Tax Exemption Temporary Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-345, the “Nonprofit Housing Organizations Tax Exemption Temporary Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-1180 and was retained by Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 21, 2004, and January 4, 2005, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 19, 2005, it was assigned Act No. 15-763 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-345 became effective on April 12, 2005.
